availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Eli S. Salyer (Pulaski County, Kentucky, farmer, postmaster, and justice of the peace)

body.p: Pulaski County, Kentucky, farmer, postmaster, and justice of the peace. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Salyer. Farmer in Pulaski County, Kentucky, in 1850. Postmaster in Grundy in Pulaski County from April 26, 1855, to October 21, 1856. Farmer in Pulaski County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Pulaski County in 1862.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski County, Division 1, p. 25B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pulaski County, District 1, p. 218.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971 Records of the Post Office Department, NARA Series M841, RG 28, Pulaski County, Kentucky, vol. 14, p. 712.
KYR-0001-031-0077.
